duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development of the web portals supporting customer, employer, and broker personas.
Provide direction and guidance to agile teams and ownership for roadmap execution and delivery.
Work closely with business leaders to ensure web portal capabilities align with business strategy.
Represent voice of the customer and take into consideration their point of view to best solve their problems.
Participate in Planning and work with Architects to understand enabler-related work.
Facilitate deliveries that include multiple third-parties and internal resources.
Partner with business leaders to continuously align the product vision and roadmap to the capabilities needed to bring business strategy to life.
Drive innovation in building Agile Product Management within a start-up, growth business within a large organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (Master's preferred)
